column4: I did a fresh install of Hardy 64bit, and when I go to log in, it bounces me back out with no error messages, I finally got in via Safe-Gnome  What gives???
I assume it has to do with the ATI drivers???  but would that cause it to bounce me out?
anyone know why a fresh install of hardy won't let me log into the normal account?
Are you capitalizing the first letter of the username?
